nodes.excerpt: Intro This article is also published on Medium Introduction I’ve always struggled with writing integration tests. Why? Because in writing integration tests, I try to mimic the environment in which my application is going to be deployed. This includes simulating databases, message brokers, and also other APIs. Simulating infrastructures (DBs and message brokers) is easy. You would just run a docker container. But what can be done about external business APIs?

frontmatter.title: A Trick to Mock APIs for Testing
frontmatter.description: A nice idea to make writing integration tests easier
